Name: gnuf
AboutMe:
I am currently working for an e-commerce company working on Android apps.

Previously, I worked at a large, social games company developing applications on Android. Prior to that, I was at a startup working as a Mobile Applications Developer, writing applications for Android, BlackBerry and iPhone, and did some backend work using using J2EE frameworks like Spring, Hibernate and Wicket.

My first job was for a cryptographic toolkit company, writing low-level libraries in C to build security stacks like SSL and IPSec. I also worked on an enterprise asset management system using PostgreSQL as a backend.

My development tools include Mac OS X and IntelliJ. I have forgotten most of my previous Ubuntu Linux knowledge. I still use vim for editing.

I have a B.Math degree from the University of Waterloo (Computer Science and Combinatorics and Optimization).
